verbose_text: Bilirubin has been shown to scavenge ROS [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and play a role in the inhibition of NADPH oxidase [XREF_BIBR] and protein kinase C (PKC) [XREF_BIBR], which are key modulators of oxidant induced adipocyte dysfunction.
